official_title: Using a Simplified Tool to Predict Lung Cancer Screening (LCS) Eligibility: Experiment to Test Effects of Messaging on Response Rates
inclusion_criteria:
1. meet age eligibility (50-80 years old) for LCS based on 2021 USPSTF guidelines; and
2. have completed at least one primary care visit at Penn Medicine in 2020-2025
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
